patthana22.17:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana22.17:0.3_0: And there are ten kinds of debate:
patthana22.17:1.1_0: There is no such thing as pleasant feeling ...
patthana22.17:1.1_2: Nor do they give rise to three feelings ...
patthana22.17:2.1_0: Nor causes suffering to arise because of painful feeling ...
patthana22.17:3.1_0: There is no principle for the sake of painful feeling ...
patthana22.17:4.1_0: No to perform the three kinds of pleasant feeling ...
patthana22.17:4.1_1: (These three discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana22.17:4.1_2: and the result of past deeds ...
patthana22.17:6.1_0: (This should not be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
patthana22.17:7.1_0: (These arenâ€™t the same thing as the previous discourse.)
patthana22.17:7.1_1: First one group of seven days should be chosened with a group. ...
